snippet.title: Rhythm Tengoku - GBA - gameplay footage - Night Walk
snippet.description:
Gameplay footage of Rhythm Tengoku for the Game Boy Advance, the predecessor to Rhythm Heaven*, released on the DS earlier this year. I enjoy the latter game, so I decided to import the GBA one. Played on the Game Cube via the Game Boy Player.

One of my favourite rhythm games in Rhythm Tengoku.

*Rhythm Paradise in Europe.
